name: Schlupus
description:
This was a project made in a few afternoons for lame jam 12 as an excuse to learn in-engine Inverse Kinematics. In a place beyond time and space, the accursed Schlupus lurks, thirsting for destruction. Punished by higher powers, the Schlupus is offered a path to it's dark goals: all it needs is to stack two cubes atop each other, and everything will be destroyed. Those that punished the Schlupus thought this impossible, end them.

[ No actual win condition I'm sorry : ( ]

The feet and legs are both controlled by IK targets. Additionally, the jiggle on head and nose are controlled by IK targets utilizing simulated ball joints. Controls: WASD to moveMouse to lookE to grab Special Note:

I intend to turn this entire project into a full game at some point. If that sounds remotely interesting, please follow for dev updates when I get the time to do that.
